search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for LawPay (lawpay.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for LawPay can be accessed at: [https://www.lawpay.com/pricing](https://www.lawpay.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: LawPay Pricing: Fees & Credit Card Processing Rates

[Schedule Demo](https://www.lawpay.com/features/schedule-a-demo/) [Get Started](https://www.lawpay.com/sign-up/)

Toggle Menu

Simple, transparent pricing
===========================

With affordable rates, no contracts, and easy billing features, there's  
a reason over 150,000 professionals use LawPay's payment technology.

Monthly Pricing

$19No Contract  
Monthly Billing

[Get Started](https://www.lawpay.com/sign-up/)

*   Visa, MasterCard & Discover: 2.99% processing + $0.30 per transaction
*   American Express: 3.90% processing + $0.30 per transaction
*   eCheck: 1% processing
*   [Pay Later](https://www.lawpay.com/features/legal-fee-financing/), a legal fee lending solution: 4.95% processing
*   Card Brand Pass-Through fees may apply

What's included

*   ![Image 10](https://res.cloudinary.com/spiralyze/image/upload/v1723550712/lawpay/3005/desktop_bullet.svg)Trust account protection
*   ![Image 12](https://res.cloudinary.com/spiralyze/image/upload/v1723550712/lawpay/3005/desktop_bullet.svg)IOLTA compliance
*   ![Image 14](https://res.cloudinary.com/spiralyze/image/upload/v1723550712/lawpay/3005/desktop_bullet.svg)Unlimited users
*   ![Image 16](https://res.cloudinary.com/spiralyze/image/upload/v1723550712/lawpay/3005/desktop_bullet.svg)PCI compliance ($150 value)
*   ![Image 18](https://res.cloudinary.com/spiralyze/image/upload/v1723550712/lawpay/3005/desktop_bullet.svg)Debit, credit, and eCheck payment types
*   ![Image 20](https://res.cloudinary.com/spiralyze/image/upload/v1723550712/lawpay/3005/desktop_bullet.svg)Custom reporting for reconciliation
*   ![Image 22](https://res.cloudinary.com/spiralyze/image/upload/v1723550712/lawpay/3005/desktop_bullet.svg)Customizable website payment pages
*   ![Image 24](https://res.cloudinary.com/spiralyze/image/upload/v1723550712/lawpay/3005/desktop_bullet.svg)All available software integrations
*   ![Image 26](https://res.cloudinary.com/spiralyze/image/upload/v1723550712/lawpay/3005/desktop_bullet.svg)Unlimited support by phone
*   ![Image 28](https://res.cloudinary.com/spiralyze/image/upload/v1723550712/lawpay/3005/desktop_bullet.svg)Billing and Invoicing

### Custom Pricing

[Contact Us](https://www.lawpay.com/about/contact-us/)LawPay also offers custom pricing. Please contact us to discuss special processing or technical requirements.

866-376-0950

pricing_data.pricing_notes: LawPay offers a simple subscription model with additional usage-based fees for transactions. Custom pricing is available for specific needs.

features: Debit, credit, and eCheck payment types

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Custom pricing for special processing or technical requirements.

additional_fees.fee_description: Additional fees may apply based on card brand.

features: Debit, credit, and eCheck payment types
